summary:
- **Remuneration Changes**:  
  - **Rob Coombe (Executive Chairman)**:  
    - Fixed remuneration increased to $350,000/year (effective 1 July 2025).  
    - One-time STI of $125,000 (Jan–Jun 2025).  
    - Granted 2 million performance rights (vesting Dec 2027, subject to TSR hurdles and shareholder approval at 2025 AGM).  
    - Term extended to 31 Dec 2026 (Executive Chair) and 31 Dec 2027 (director).  

  - **Grant Hackett (CEO)**:  
    - Fixed remuneration increased to $700,000/year (effective 1 July 2025).  
    - STI potential increased to 90% of fixed remuneration (previously 50%).  
    - Notice period extended by 3 months (6 months total).  

**No material trading or capital markets impact identified** (executive remuneration changes only).
